-----Original message-----
From: SnowfireL@...
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sun, Jan 15, 2012 15:24:19 GMT+00:00
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: strange sounds,

If its a "hoax" it's world wide one, I heard weird sounds like this, too it 
 was one night couple weeks ago, I just ignored it, and went back to sleep, 
and i  live in MI, so, I have no idea what it could be. I did think it 
sounded like  someone was testing an alarm.  sf
 
 
In a message dated 1/15/2012 10:13:12 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
vertigomindwarp@... writes:

 
 
 
That's some weird stuff,  are there any ideas on what it could be? 
 
Hoax?
